Bicycle Helmet - Noise Reduction: Integrate noise-canceling technology to reduce wind noise, enhancing rider comfort during high-speed rides.
Bicycle Helmet - Ventilation System: Implement a ventilation system that actively adjusts airflow, temperature, and humidity levels to ensure optimal comfort during rides.
Bicycle Helmet - Personalized Designs: Offer customizable designs featuring riders' names, favorite logos, or personalized messages to boost individuality and self-expression.
Bicycle Helmet - Fitness Monitoring: Include an integrated fitness tracker that monitors and provides real-time data on heart rate, speed, and other vital information to improve riding performance.
Bicycle Helmet - Security Alerts: Implement a GPS locator, allowing loved ones to track and locate riders, especially during high-risk activities like long-distance challenges or off-road adventures.
